summary: This is a mod that replaces the original meshes of the bears in Skyrim and fixes some characteristics as the tummy, the back and the calfs of the bears.
descriptionHtml:
Have you ever wondered why some bears\' characteristics in Skyrim are a bit unrealistic? Me neither. But you don\'t know what you need until someone tells you!

This is a mod that replaces the original meshes of the bears in Skyrim and fixes some characteristics as the tummy, the back and the calfs of the bears.

Installation:

-Download the RAR file.
-Unpack it and paste the Data folder inside to your Skyrim main folder.
-Yes to replace.
-Enter Skyrim and enjoy it!
author: Bulinguillo
